name: Fashioning Little Miss Lonesome
description: When two handsome young men spot the perfect girl to be their first model and help make a name for themselves, they're determined to go for broke and make her shineâ€”but first they'll have to get her out of her house! Can these two really give such an anti-social recluse the makeover she needs to be a star?
